00014 #ifndef ULIB_EVENT_FD_H
00015 #define ULIB_EVENT_FD_H 1
00016 
00017 #ifdef HAVE_LIBEVENT
00018 #       include <ulib/libevent/event.h>
00019 #endif
00020 
00021 #define U_READ_IN               0x001 // NB: same as EPOLLIN
00022 #define U_WRITE_OUT     0x004 // NB: same as EPOLLOUT
00023 
00024 #define U_NOTIFIER_OK      0
00025 #define U_NOTIFIER_DELETE -1
00026 
00027 class U_EXPORT UEventFd {
00028 public:
00029 
00030         // Check for memory error
00031         U_MEMORY_TEST
00032 
00033         // Allocator e Deallocator
00034         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00035         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00036 
00037         int fd, op_mask; // [ U_READ_IN | U_WRITE_OUT ]
00038 
00039         UEventFd()
00040                 {
00041                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UEventFd, "", 0)
00042 
00043 #       ifdef HAVE_LIBEVENT
00044                 pevent = 0;
00045 #       endif
00046                 }
00047 
00048         virtual ~UEventFd()
00049                 {
00050                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UEventFd)
00051 
00052 #       ifdef HAVE_LIBEVENT
00053                 if (pevent)
00054                         {
00055                         UDispatcher::del(pevent);
00056                                                  delete pevent;
00057                         }
00058 #       endif
00059                 }
00060 
00061         // method VIRTUAL to define
00062 
00063         virtual int handlerRead()  { return U_NOTIFIER_DELETE; }
00064         virtual int handlerWrite() { return U_NOTIFIER_DELETE; }
00065 
00066 #ifdef HAVE_LIBEVENT
00067         UEvent<UEventFd>* pevent;
00068 
00069         void operator()(int fd, short event);
00070 #endif
00071 
00072 #ifdef DEBUG
00073         const char* dump(bool reset) const { return "..."; } 
00074 #endif
00075 
00076 private:
00077         UEventFd(const UEventFd&)            {}
00078         UEventFd& operator=(const UEventFd&) { return *this; }
00079 };
00080 
00081 #endif
